markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Harrow Court](/Traits.aspx?ID=496)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 75</row>

This trait is associated with the _Deck of Destiny_ and [the Harrow Court](/Planes.aspx?ID=23). It is limited to the Stolen Fate campaign.
name: Harrow Court
